lines.text: Maybe the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> stopped him, somehow?
I mean, it's in the name.
Y'know, like... that freeze spell, maybe. <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum.</c>
Possible. Why would he do that?
Hm. Well, we can revisit that if we find some motive, but for now, I think we should assume they were working together.
